siteMetadata.title: OpenLineage
siteMetadata.description: Data lineage is the foundation for a new generation of powerful, context-aware data tools and best practices. OpenLineage enables consistent collection of lineage metadata, creating a deeper understanding of how data is produced and used.
siteMetadata.introTag: An open framework for data lineage collection and analysis
siteMetadata.about: OpenLineage is an open platform for collection and analysis of data lineage. It tracks metadata about datasets, jobs, and runs, giving users the information required to identify the root cause of complex issues and understand the impact of changes. OpenLineage contains an open standard for lineage data collection, a metadata repository reference implementation (Marquez), libraries for common languages, and integrations with data pipeline tools.

frontmatter.title: dbt
frontmatter.description: Enabling OpenLineage in dbt can capture lineage metadata for transformations running within your data warehouse.

frontmatter.title: Apache Spark
frontmatter.description: OpenLineage can automatically track lineage of jobs and datasets across Spark jobs.

frontmatter.title: Apache Airflow
frontmatter.description: Enabling OpenLineage in Apache Airflow automatically tracks metadata about jobs and datasets as DAGs execute.

frontmatter.title: Pursuing Lineage from Airflow using Custom Extractors
frontmatter.description: Built-in support for custom extractors makes OpenLineage a highly adaptable solution for pipelines that use Airflow.
frontmatter.author: Maciej Obuchowski & Michael Robinson

frontmatter.title: How Operators and Extractors Work Under-the-Hook
frontmatter.description: A technical deep-dive on how the Airflow OSS and OpenLineage OSS projects interact.
frontmatter.author: Benji Lampel

frontmatter.title: The Current State of Column-level Lineage
frontmatter.description: Column-level lineage helps organizations navigate a complex regulatory landscape.
frontmatter.author: Michael Robinson

frontmatter.title: The Python Client -- the Foundation of OpenLineage Integrations
frontmatter.description: The Python client enables users to create custom integrations.
frontmatter.author: Michael Robinson

frontmatter.title: Microsoft Purview Accelerates Lineage Extraction from Azure Databricks
frontmatter.description: A new collaboration between Microsoft and OpenLineage is making lineage extraction possible for Azure Databricks and Microsoft Purview users.
frontmatter.author: Chandru Sugunan, Will Johnson & Michael Robinson

frontmatter.title: Data Lineage with Snowflake
frontmatter.description: The OpenLineage Adapter offers Snowflake's enterprise users a powerful tool for analyzing their pipelines.
frontmatter.author: Michael Robinson
